com.lavanya.api.controller

Class FriendController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.api.controller.FriendController

  • @RestController
public class FriendController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller to control all the requests related to Friend object.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        @PostMapping(value="/saveFriend")
public void save(@RequestBody
                                                    FriendDto friendDto)
        POST requests for /saveFriend endpoint. method to save a friend request between two users.
        Parameters:
        friendDto - to save in database.

      • isMyfriend

        @GetMapping(value="/isFriend/{userProfileVisitedId}")
public java.lang.Boolean isMyfriend(@PathVariable(value="userProfileVisitedId")
                                                                                           java.util.UUID userProfileVisitedId)
        GET requests for /isFriend/{userProfileVisitedId} endpoint. method to verify if a friend relationship exists between two users even if this relation is still awaiting a validation from one of the parties.
        Parameters:
        userProfileVisitedId - uuid of the user wih who the user connected need to verify an already existing friendship.
        Returns:
        a boolean true or false

      • getFriendRequestsByUser

        @GetMapping(value="/friendsRequest")
public java.util.List<FriendDto> getFriendRequestsByUser()
        GET requests for /friendsRequest endpoint. method to retrieve list of all Friends requests sent by a user of interest but not accepted yet.
        Returns:
        list of FriendDtos.

      • getFriendsListByUser

        @GetMapping(value="/friends")
public java.util.List<FriendDto> getFriendsListByUser()
        GET requests for /friends endpoint. method to retrieve list of all Friends of the user connected.
        Returns:
        list of FriendDtos.

      • acceptFriendInvitation

        @PostMapping(value="/updateFriend/{id}")
public void acceptFriendInvitation(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                             int id)
        POST requests for /updateFriend/{id} endpoint. method to validate a friend request as accepted by the user who was invited.
        Parameters:
        id - of the friend entity to accept.

      • refuseFriendInvitation

        @PostMapping(value="/deleteFriend/{id}")
public void refuseFriendInvitation(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                             int id)
        POST requests for /deleteFriend/{id} endpoint. method to delete a friend request not accepted yet or friend relation already accepted.
        Parameters:
        id - of the friend entity of interest.

      • getFriendById

        @GetMapping(value="/users/friend/{userInvitedId}")
public FriendDto getFriendById(@PathVariable(value="userInvitedId")
                                                                                   java.util.UUID userInvitedId)
        GET requests for /users/friend/{userInvitedId} endpoint. method to retrieve a friend entity using both users involved.
        Parameters:
        userInvitedId - uuid of the user involved in the friend relationship.
        Returns:
        FriendDto.

      • getCountOfFriendsByUser

        @GetMapping(value="user/count/friends")
public java.lang.Integer getCountOfFriendsByUser()
        GET requests for user/count/friends endpoint. method to count the amount of Friends the user connected has.
        Returns:
        Integer.
